REAIR nged BRL-CAD BRL-CAD User Commands
reair Set the 'aircode' attribute of all regions within a group.
reair # this part commented out - proposed addition of -n flag # # -n # # num # # comb aircode
DESCRIPTION
The 'reair' command assigns the 'aircode' attribute value for all regions within a specified combination. # commented out for proposed -n addition # Optionally, the increment between consecutive 'aircode' can be # specified. Once the command is complete, the highest 'aircode' set # is reported.
# commented out for proposed -n addition # OPTIONS # # # -n num # #
# Increment to use between consecutive aircodes. # The default is 1. # # # #
EXAMPLES
Set the aircode
Set the aircode to 2.
mged> reair example.c 2
All regions under example.c will have their aircode reset to 2.
